node.title: How to host an affordable and cheerful Aussie Christmas
node.description: Christmas does not have to be a time of overspending, overeating and plastic waste. Here's how one family on the NSW coast creates a distinctly Australian festive season.
node.content:
["Riding on the back of colonisation, Santa made his way to Australia \u2014\u00a0snow, reindeers and all.", "But one family on the south coast of NSW, is tired of the old narrative, and for the past decade has celebrated Christmas in a sustainable and Australian way.\u00a0\u00a0", "By incorporating seasonal flowers,\u00a0foliage and fabric for gift wrapping, time together and gratitude are the gifts that keep on giving.\u00a0", "And there's no plastic waste in sight.", "Bec\u00a0Nikolovski, who comes from a large family, has her own family of five children.", "Her\u00a0eldest is 25 now so Ms Nikolovski has had many years to massage her own Christmas style,\u00a0adapting and\u00a0modifying over the years to include less tinsel and trappings, with more emphasis on creating an\u00a0Australian bush theme.", "Here's what she has learned.", "", "
Bec Nikolovski prefers a real tree from Christmas tree farms \u2014 and a gingerbread ute.(Supplied: Bec\u00a0Nikolovski)
", "
Inviting nature to Christmas Day
", "\"First and foremost, we now have a real Christmas tree every year,\" Ms Nikolovski said.\u00a0", "The family goes to a local Christmas tree farm, which Ms Nikolovski \u00a0concludes\u00a0is more environmentally sound than carting around a plastic one, besides the family enjoys the festive outing together.", "\"That's a heap of fun. We choose our own tree, cut it down and bring it home,\" she said.", "", "
Bec Nikolovski\u00a0uses Australian print Christmas fabrics instead of wrapping paper.(ABC Illawarra: Sarah Moss)
", "Although the family still enjoys Christmas lights on their tree, they stopped using\u00a0tinsel and plastic decorations\u00a0years ago.", "\"We've made some paper chains or felt chains that we can use year in year out, and that's something we can sit down and make together,\" she said.", "\"It's really quite fun.\"\u00a0", "Instead of purchasing paper wrapping, Ms Nikolovski uses Australia patterned fabric to wrap presents.\u00a0", "", "
The Nikolovskis\u00a0Christmas lunch comprises \"seafood, lovely salads\" and other fresh fare.(ABC Illawarra: Sarah Moss)
", "\"I might just buy a couple of meters of that, and that's what we use to wrap our presents every year,\" she said.", "\"And we don't need sticky tape because we use ribbon.", "
A green Christmas
", "\"Not being a religious family, I think the reason we still perpetuate Christmas and celebrate Christmas is purely because it is a lot of fun,\" Ms Nikolovski said.", "However, she acknowledges that many people are overwhelmed by the expectations of Christmas, driving anxiety high.\u00a0", "", "
Bec\u00a0Nikolovski's truly authentic Australian Christmas has a beach wombat instead of a snow dome.(ABC Illawarra: Sarah Moss)
", "\"With that expectation comes this pressure to spend, and so many people get into so much debt over Christmas,\" she said.", "\"So it's not just the waste that can hang around for months or years \u2026 people can get into debt for Christmas and be paying it off right up until next Christmas, which just seems crazy.", "This is why her family makes or bakes gifts\u00a0for one another.\u00a0", "\"Something to unwrap on Christmas Day,\u00a0that's a necessity, but I also try and incorporate some things \u2026\u00a0even a voucher or movies or anything like that,\" she said.", "", "
Bec\u00a0Nikolovski decorates\u00a0her home with Australian foliage to create\u00a0a natural\u00a0Christmas.(ABC Illawarra: Sarah Moss)
", "She also highly recommends the gift of experiences, which become something further to look forward to.\u00a0", "\"If they know they are going to be given something that has heart and love, and without sounding tacky or cliched, that is really what the essence of Christmas should be about,\" she said.", "She says the festive season is a time for gratitude.", "\"I think that\u2019s probably really what the essence of Christmas should be, and hopefully is for us.\"", "Ms\u00a0Nikolovski\u00a0 hopes her children's experience of\u00a0growing\u00a0up with a more distinctly Australian version of Christmas will steer them away from the type of Christmas she had as a child, which incorporated many northern hemisphere\u00a0traditions.", "\"We had fake snow on the windows and that sort of thing, whereas now I am trying to\u00a0get them to understand that a lot of Australian families will probably head down to the beach straight after Christmas lunch, so, it's\u00a0just not our Christmas.\"", "", "
Australian Christmas books,\u00a0where\u00a0Santa is dressed in thongs and board shorts.(ABC Illawarra: Sarah Moss)
"]
